mappings.notes: A NavigateToPose goal is a Portarium Task: the robot is commanded to navigate to a target pose. The Task lifecycle mirrors the action goal lifecycle.
NavigateThroughPoses mission maps to a Task; poses array is the ordered waypoint list.
FollowWaypoints maps to a Task; each waypoint may have an associated task executor run at arrival.
Dock mission is a Task; represents a physical docking manoeuvre as a Portarium workflow step.
Navigation feedback is a real-time telemetry stream; surfaced as ExternalObjectRef in cockpit progress widgets.
Navigation result carries error code on failure; linked to the Task as its completion evidence.
Path planning requests are pre-execution read-only ops; no canonical Task needed.
In-place rotation primitive; treated as a sub-task ExternalObjectRef within a larger mission Task.
